column4: Please. I need thunderbird to the version 8.0 to work with the calendar add-on
You can actually open the plug in manually and edit the versions allowed. I forgot how to do it but. A quick google should suffice

Add-on, rather. Should be able to go to their website and download a .xml or similar for the plugin, then you can right click it and open it in your text editor and there will be a line with allowed versions, change it to reflect your version number, bam.
File extensions mean nothing, right click it and try to open it in gedit
Hm. I forgot how to do it. It might be zipped or something. Try Googling "editing firefox add ons for versions"
oh no. it workds for 13.0, 13.1, I have 12.0
So modify it, and see if it works.
guess what, I can't install the add-on because dayly 16.0b isn't compatible :(
